name: 陈巍

last_movies.title: 2026年米兰·科尔蒂纳丹佩佐冬季奥运会

introduction: Nathan Chen (born May 5, 1999) is an American figure skater who competes in the men's singles discipline. He is a two-time World champion (2018, 2019), a 2018 Winter Olympic bronze medalist in the team event, the 2017 Four Continents champion, a two-time Grand Prix Final champion (2017, 2018), and three-time U.S. national champion (2017, 2018, 2019).On the junior level, Chen is the 2015–16 Junior Grand Prix Final champion, 2013–14 Junior Grand Prix Final bronze medalist, and 2014 World Junior bronze medalist.Chen is the first and currently only skater competing with five quadruple jumps: toe loop, salchow, loop, flip and lutz.
